      • sendReportOnClicked

        public void sendReportOnClicked(View view)
        Called when the report observation button is clicked

        Checks if the input fields are valid then trying to connect to the server. Here there is also done a check to see if the report to be sent is a PhotoReport or a TextReport.

        Parameters:
        view -
